summary: A tough CIA agent is called in to put a stop to a shipment of weapons to the Viet Cong from an arms smuggling ring.
cast: Roger Browne|Helga Liné|Miguel de la Riva|Franco Ressel|Rosalba Neri|Andrea Scotti|Susan Terry|Mila Stanic|Peter Blades|Dario De Grassi|Francesca Rosano|Giorgio Ubaldi|Beni Deus|Franco Lantieri|Ángel Menéndez|Leu Lii Young|Cheu Yea Hong|Enzo Andronico|Antonio Gradoli|Umberto Raho|Alfonso Rojas|Maria Barba|Rossella Bergamonti|Wally Seeber|Jeff Cameron|Osiride Pevarello|Renzo Pevarello
title: Operación Mogador
